section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:

para.text: “Domestic partner” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 32-701(3).
“Domestic partnership” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 32-701(4).
“Probate Court” means the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 16-79 rewrote section which had read as follows: “For purposes of this chapter ‘Probate Court’ means the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.”
